questions.question: The five components of health are

choices.answer: Physical, mental, educational, cultural and spiritual
Physical, mental, social, cultural and spiritual
Mental, social, cognitive, cultural and spiritual
Physical, mental, social, cognitive and spiritual

questions.question: Which of the following is a dietary guideline?

choices.answer: Enjoy a wide variety of nutritious food from the 5 food groups
Eats a small amount of junk food everyday
Drink lots of water
Monitor the consumption of caffeine

questions.question: Which of the following is true about eating disorders?

choices.answer: Eating disorders are a choice
Eating disorders are a serious mental illness that can effect anyone
Eating disorders are related to vanity
You can tell by looking at someone that they have an eating disorder

questions.question: Family and friends can impact an individual's body image by

choices.answer: Obsessing about body weight
Talking about 'awesome' diets they've tried
Making comments about changes to your body
All of the above

questions.question: Caffeine is a legal, stimulant drug. What is an effect of caffeine?

choices.answer: It speeds up your heart rate and can give you a headache
It can cause hallucinations
It slows down your heart rate and makes you sleepy
It speeds up your heart rate and can make you sleepy

choices.answer: it is cheap but very difficult to access
it is very expensive and difficult to access
it is easy to access and their friends might be drinking it
it is difficult to access but their friends might be drinking it
It's not risky

It is an illegal drug
